name: Guilherme Moresco Bisotto
tagline: Mobile and Web Developer / UI-UX and Visual Designer
body:
```swift // // WelcomeViewController.swift // Guilherme Moresco Bisotto // // Created by Guilherme Moresco Bisotto on 6/23/16. // Copyright © 2016 Guilherme Moresco Bisotto. All rights reserved. // import UIKit class WelcomeViewController: UIViewController { override func viewDidLoad() { super.viewDidLoad() self.printAboutMe() self.printPortfolio() self.printALittleMore() self.printContact() } } ``` *** ###//MARK: - about me A developer who passed through the gates to the world of Design ...

An Information Systems student at PUCRS (Pontifical Catholic University of Rio Grande do Sul) that easily would study Design ...

A nerd who play sports ...

Someone who turns nights and more nights creating layouts, writing code and learning new technologies and tricks only just for the pleasure of learning ...

Glad to meet you, I am Guilherme Bisotto! =) *** ###//MARK: - portfolio `Aproximar - iOS/Android/Web`
This project aims to facilitate the communication about students daily routine between schools and parents through mobile devices.
3rd Place - 8 Tournament Entrepreneur PUCRS (November/2014)

![aproximar-0](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327465/8e6c5c82-39a5-11e6-9792-48555a66219a.jpg) ![aproximar-1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327458/8d672ccc-39a5-11e6-8839-97589916abb7.jpg) ![aproximar-2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327459/8da58aa8-39a5-11e6-89c8-963b7a687f12.jpg) ![aproximar-4](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327462/8e621ad8-39a5-11e6-9286-79e16a17a880.jpg) ![aproximar-5](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327463/8e659122-39a5-11e6-96fe-bae47514c8bb.jpg) ![aproximar-6](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327466/8e6d76bc-39a5-11e6-9781-355ab6a285b2.jpg) ![aproximar-7](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327464/8e6a4bcc-39a5-11e6-9ac8-6761b689216d.jpg) ![aproximar-9](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327461/8e3c6130-39a5-11e6-94f1-c32d4628b619.jpg) ![aproximar-8](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327467/8f79bf66-39a5-11e6-8237-908dfcb1d4cf.jpg)

`Ball Legacy - iOS`
Bounce as fast as possible and dodge from enemies to get to the portal. You are against the clock, so hurry up! Ball Legacy is a vintage game in cyberpunk style.
Take a look: [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5SA-RtYdL_k)

![ball-legacy-1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327773/7e7cf6fc-39a9-11e6-895a-9e1ca5c0dec3.jpg) ![ball-legacy-2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327776/7ee70826-39a9-11e6-8ee1-1177997a89ac.jpg) ![ball-legacy-3](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327775/7ee5286c-39a9-11e6-9df4-1caf87f31bfc.jpg) ![ball-legacy-4](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327777/7ef15fe2-39a9-11e6-927f-d9df761b8b16.jpg) ![ball-legacy-5](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327774/7edbefae-39a9-11e6-9936-40aaffa6cd8c.jpg)

`BoomBalloon - iOS`
Pop as many balloons as you can, but be careful we have some surprises for you!
App Store: [App Store](https://itunes.apple.com/br/app/boomballoon/id981898204?l=en&mt=8)

![boomballoon-1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327074/9d27ad4c-39a2-11e6-9a77-789c6777352d.jpg)![boomballoon-2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327099/d6c27578-39a2-11e6-9fda-c3f392c9370e.jpg) ![boomballoon-3](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6160000/16327100/d73497f2-39a2-11e6-8e4d-0c193181c9ab.jpg)

`DuckTrello - Android`
Generate customized graphs from data of Trello.

*** ###//MARK: - a little more * Participation in the second edition of Startup Garagem (PUCRS/Raiar, 2015).

* 8º Entrepreneur tournament PUCRS (3ª placed with the Aproximar project, 2014).

* São Paulo Mobility Challenge in Devpost Platform (3 placed with the Vita project, 2015).

* Participation in the process of acceleration Accelerator WOW in 2015/I.

* WWDC 2015 Scholarship. [ WWDC](https://developer.apple.com/wwdc/)

* Taught in BEPiD, workshop on the Git versioning and good working practices.

* Taught in BEPiD, workshop on Implementing UI Designs in Interface Builder. *** ###//MARK: - contact - E-mail: **guibisotto@gmail.com** - Telephone: **+55 (51) 9666-6390** - LinkedIn: **https://br.linkedin.com/in/guilhermebisotto** - Facebook: **https://www.facebook.com/guilherme.bisotto** - Skype: **guilhermebisotto**
